To Do List is a simple application for quick management of to-do lists.

The application allows you to sort the lists by different criteria: by pending tasks, by alphabetical order and by personal preference.

Different icons indicate if all the tasks in a list have been completed.

Gestures for quick actions:

  • Drag a list or task to the right to delete it.
  • Press and hold a list until it changes color and drag it up or down to change its position.

Security and privacy

To Do List does not connect to the network and the data is saved only on your device.

This application does not require any permission and waives advertising and tracking mechanisms.
